Header: “Welcome to Marwen” will be released by next month
Content: “Welcome to Marwen” is an upcoming American drama film co-written by Robert Zemeckis and Caroline Thompson and directed by Zemeckis. It is inspired by Jeff Malmberg’s 2010 documentary Marwencol. The film stars Steve Carell, Leslie Mann, Diane Kruger, Merritt Wever and Neil Jackson. Mark Hogancamp, a victim of a violent assault, constructs a miniature World War II village, called Marwencol, in his yard to help in his recovery. The film will be released by Universal Pictures on 21st of next month.
